data.comment: The match has started at Municipal de Balaidos.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Atletico.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Atletico.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 5, Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Atletico have got their heads in front thanks to a Luis Suarez strike.
Great play from Manuel Sanchez to set up the goal.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Atletico at Municipal de Balaidos.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Iago Aspas for Celta Vigo drives towards goal at Municipal de Balaidos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 16, Iago Aspas (Celta Vigo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atletico's Mario Hermoso has been booked in Vigo.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 19, Atletico to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Atletico throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 20, In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
In the minute 23, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
In Vigo, Santi Mina (Celta Vigo) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Celta Vigo are pushing forward but Sergio Carreira Vilarino's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santi Mina gets his shot on target but fails to score for Celta Vigo.
Important block from the Atletico defence as Iago Aspas fires in a strike for Celta Vigo.
In the minute 29, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Celta Vigo are coming forward and Lucas Olaza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Atletico have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Atletico drive upfield and Lucas Torreira gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Celta Vigo defender.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 34, Jeison Murillo (Celta Vigo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Celta Vigo drives forward and Jose Fontan gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
In the minute 36, Celta Vigo's Lucas Olaza misses with an attempt on goal.
Atletico have a goal kick.
Diego Costa (Atletico) has received a yellow card from Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 38, Free kick Atletico.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Atletico attack but Diego Costa's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Atletico a goal kick.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 41, At Municipal de Balaidos, Fran Beltran has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Atletico in the half of Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Municipal de Balaidos.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
Atletico's Luis Suarez gets in a shot on goal at Municipal de Balaidos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 48, Atletico have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
The match at Municipal de Balaidos has been interrupted briefly for a check on Diego Costa, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 50, Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Diego Simeone (Atletico) is making a first substitution, with Felipe replacing Diego Costa.
Joao Felix is replacing Manuel Sanchez for Atletico at Municipal de Balaidos.
Throw-in Atletico.
Throw-in high up the field for Celta Vigo in Vigo.
In the minute 52, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Jeison Murillo (Celta Vigo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In the minute 53, Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
In the minute 55, In Vigo Atletico attack through Thomas Lemar. The finish is off target, however.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Atletico have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Atletico at Municipal de Balaidos.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Nolito for Celta Vigo has been booked by Juan Martinez Munuera and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 63, Emre Mor is replacing Fran Beltran for the home team.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Santi Mina with Denis Suarez. This is the second substitution made today by Oscar Garcia.
In the minute 64, Diego Simeone is making the team's third substitution at Municipal de Balaidos with Yannick Carrasco replacing Luis Suarez.
Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in Atletico.
Diego Simeone (Atletico) is making a fourth substitution, with Marcos Llorente replacing Thomas Lemar.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 67, Atletico have a dangerous throw-in.
Celta Vigo needs to be cautious. Atletico have an attacking throw-in.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a throw-in for Atletico, close to Celta Vigo's area.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Celta Vigo.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 71, Felipe (Atletico) has received a first yellow card.
Attention is being given to Celta Vigo’s Iago Aspas and play has been suspended briefly.
Celta Vigo’s Iago Aspas is on his feet again at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 73, Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico at Municipal de Balaidos.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Atletico pushes forward through Marcos Llorente, whose finish on goal is saved.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 76, In Vigo, Felipe (Atletico) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
The away team replace Angel Correa with Hector Herrera.
In the minute 78, Free kick Celta Vigo.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Vigo, Celta Vigo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Celta Vigo's Iago Aspas has been booked in Vigo.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, Gabriel Veiga is replacing Sergio Carreira Vilarino for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Free kick Celta Vigo.
At Municipal de Balaidos, Hector Herrera has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Jeison Murillo (Celta Vigo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 87, Juan Martinez Munuera awards Atletico a goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lucas Torreira.
The home team have replaced Lucas Olaza with Miguel Rodriguez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Oscar Garcia.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Lucas Torreira has recovered and rejoins the match in Vigo.
Atletico have a goal kick.
At Municipal de Balaidos the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Atletico.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
Celta Vigo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atletico.
Throw-in for Atletico close to the penalty box.
Atletico are in shooting range from this free kick.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Goal! Yannick Carrasco extends Atletico lead to 0-2 with a header.
